All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Represents an application metadata.
Argument
Argument is a record that represents a key-value pair argument.
AsciidocAttributeProvider
Provider of Asciidoctor attributes.
AsciidocConfiguration
AsciidocConfiguration is an interface that defines the configuration properties for Asciidoc processing.
AsciidocConfigurationProperties
AsciidocConfigurationProperties is a class that implements the AsciidocConfiguration interface.
AsciidocConverter
AsciidocConverter is an interface that defines methods for converting Asciidoc files.
AsciidocMacro
AsciidocMacro is a record that represents an Asciidoc macro.
AsciidocUtils
Utility class for Asciidoc.
Attribute
Attribute is a record that represents an Asciidoc attribute with a key and a list of values.
BuildDiffLinkSubstitution
BuildDiffLinkSubstitution is a singleton class that implements the MacroSubstitution interface.
BuildMacroExclusion
C that provides macro exclusion functionality for build tools.
CalloutMacroSubstitution
CalloutMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends LineMacroSubstitution.
CategoriesIndexGenerator
Generates a category index.
Classpath
Enum representing the classpath types.
CliMacroSubstitution
Class that provides CLI macro substitution for different cli applications.
Cloud
Cloud is an enumeration that represents different cloud providers.
CommonMacroSubstitution
Class that provides macro substitution functionality for common placeholders in guide templates.
CoordinatesProvider
CoordinatesProvider is an interface that defines a method to retrieve a map of coordinates.
CopyFileVisitor
CopyFileVisitor is a class that extends SimpleFileVisitor to copy files and directories from a source path to a target path.
DefaultAsciidocConverter
DefaultAsciidocConverter is a singleton class that implements the AsciidocConverter interface.
DefaultCategoriesIndexGenerator
Default implementation of CategoriesIndexGenerator.
DefaultCoordinatesProvider
Interface for generating test scripts for guides.
DefaultGuideMerger
Default implementation of the GuideMerger interface.
DefaultGuideParser
Class that provides methods to parse guide metadata.
DefaultGuideProjectGenerator
Builder class for constructing SourceBlock instances.
DefaultGuideProjectZipper
Default implementation of the GuideProjectZipper interface.
DefaultIndexGenerator
Default implementation of the IndexGenerator interface.
DefaultJsonFeedGenerator
Class that implements the JsonFeedGenerator interface.
DefaultJsonSchemaProvider
DefaultJsonSchemaProvider is a singleton class that implements the JsonSchemaProvider interface.
DefaultLicenseLoader
DefaultLicenseLoader is a singleton class that loads and manages license headers.
DefaultRssFeedGenerator
Class that provides RSS feed generation functionality.
DefaultWebsiteGenerator
Default implementation of the WebsiteGenerator interface.
DependencyLines
Class that provides utility methods for generating dependency lines in Asciidoc format.
DependencyMacroSubstitution
Class that provides macro substitution functionality for dependency placeholders in guide templates.
ExternalMacroSubstitution
ExternalMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends LineMacroSubstitution.
ExternalTemplateMacroSubstitution
ExternalTemplateMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends LineMacroSubstitution.
FeaturesMacroSubstitution
Class that provides macro substitution functionality for feature placeholders in guide templates.
FeaturesWordsMacroSubstitution
Class that provides macro substitution functionality for features words in guide templates.
FilesTransferUtility
FilesTransferUtility is an interface that defines a method to transfer files from an input directory to an output directory.
FileType
FileType is an enumeration that represents the type of a file.
Guide
Represents a guide metadata.
GuideGenerationUtils
Utility class for generating paths and options for guides.
GuideLinkMacroSubstitution
GuideLinkMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that implements the MacroSubstitution interface.
GuideMatrixGenerator
Interface for generating a matrix for guides.
GuideMerger
Interface for merging guide metadata.
GuidePageGenerator
Render individual guide.
GuideParser
GuideParser is an interface that defines methods for parsing metadata of guides.
GuideProjectGenerator
GuideProjectGenerator is an interface for generating guide projects.
GuideProjectZipper
Interface for zipping a directory into a single output file.
GuideRender
Encapsulate a guide and its options for rendering.
GuideRenderAttributesProvider
Provider of Asciidoctor rendering attributes.
GuidesConfiguration
GuidesConfiguration is an interface that defines the configuration settings for guides.
GuidesConfigurationProperties
GuidesConfigurationProperties is a class that implements the GuidesConfiguration interface.
GuidesOption
GuidesOption is a class that encapsulates the options for a guide, including the build tool, programming language, and test framework.
GuidesTemplatesConfiguration
Configuration for the guides templates.
GuideUtils
GuideUtils is a utility class that provides various helper methods for handling guides.
HtmlUtils
Utility class for HTML.
IncludeDirective
Asciidoc Include Directive.
IncludeDirective.Builder
Builder class for constructing IncludeDirective instances.
IndexGenerator
Interface for generating an index page for a list of guides.
JdkLowerThanMacroExclusion
JdkLowerThanMacroExclusion is a singleton class that extends MacroExclusion.
JsonFeedConfiguration
Interface for configuring JSON feed settings.
JsonFeedConfigurationProperties
Configuration properties for JSON feed.
JsonFeedGenerator
JsonFeedGenerator is an interface that defines a method for generating a JSON feed string from a list of Guide metadata objects.
JsonSchemaProvider
Functional interface for providing a JSON Schema used to validate guides.
LanguageMacroExclusion
LanguageMacroExclusion is a singleton class that extends MacroExclusion.
LicenseLoader
LicenseLoader is an interface that defines methods to load license header.
LineReplacementMacroSubstitution
Line Replacement Macro Substitution.
MacroSubstitution
MacroSubstitution is an interface that defines methods for substituting macros in Asciidoc files.
MacroUtils
MacroUtils is a utility class that provides various methods for handling macros in strings.
PlaceholderMacroSubstitution
Class that provides macro substitution functionality for placeholders in guide templates.
PlacheholderMacro
PlacheholderMacro is a record that represents a macro with a name and a target.
Range
Range is a record that represents a range with a starting point (from) and an ending point (to).
RawTestMacroSubstitution
RawTestMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends TestMacroSubstitution.
ResourceMacroSubstitution
Class that provides macro substitution functionality for resource placeholders in guide templates.
RssFeedConfiguration
Interface for RSS feed configuration.
RssFeedConfigurationProperties
RssFeedConfigurationProperties is a configuration properties class that implements the RssFeedConfiguration interface.
RssFeedGenerator
RssFeedGenerator is an interface that defines a method to generate an RSS feed from a list of guides.
SourceBlock
GuideUtils is a utility class that provides various helper methods for handling guides.
SourceBlock.Builder
Builder class for constructing SourceBlock instances.
SourceMacroSubstitution
SourceMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends SourceBlockMacroSubstitution.
TemplateLoaderUtils
Utility class for loading templates.
TestMacroSubstitution
TestMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends SourceBlockMacroSubstitution.
TestResourceMacroSubstitution
Class that provides macro substitution functionality for test resource placeholders in guide templates.
TestScriptGenerator
Interface for generating test scripts for guides.
WebsiteGenerator
Interface for generating the guides website assets from the specified input directory to the specified output directory.
ZipIncludeMacroSubstitution
ZipIncludeMacroSubstitution is a singleton class that extends SourceBlockMacroSubstitution.
